headline: Methyl Acetate Industry Research and Global Forecast Report 2025-2030: Lucrative Opportunities in Expanding Applications Across High-Growth Industries, & Growth Through Bio-based and Circular Economy
summary: The global methyl acetate market is projected to grow from USD 228.0 million in 2025 to USD 388.5 million by 2030, at a CAGR of 7.9%. This growth is driven by its fast-evaporating, low-toxicity advantages, making it a preferred solvent in paints, coatings, adhesives, pharmaceuticals, and electronics. With increasing VOC regulations from environmental bodies like the EPA and ECHA, manufacturers are innovating by offering sustainable, high-purity variants. Asia Pacific leads the market, supported
